snippet: Amid the debate over how to respond to the Syrian civil war, many see links to the genocide in Rwanda 20 years ago.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; Clinton administration's failure to prevent the Rwandan genocide 20 years ago has hung as a shadow over the Obama administration as it struggles with a fitful response to civil war in Syria; new wave of diplomatic setbacks has cast doubt on whether there will be a meaningful response to the Syrian crisis, which is likely to be remembered as the Rwanda of the current era.
lead_paragraph: Amid the debate over how to respond to the Syrian civil war, many see links to the genocide in Rwanda 20 years ago.

headline.main: U.S. Envoys See a Rwanda Moment in Escalating Syrian Crisis
headline.print_headline: U.S. Envoys See a Rwanda Moment in Escalating Syrian Crisis
